summary: This is an FBI 302 interview summary of Jessica Nicodemo, conducted on August 23, 2019. Nicodemo recounts a conversation with Tara Lordi, who relayed information about Glenn Straub's interactions with Jeffrey Epstein, including Epstein bringing a 15-year-old Russian girl to a party on Straub's yacht.

persons.name: Jessica Nicodemo
persons.context: Interviewed by the FBI and IRS-CID on August 23, 2019. She reported a conversation with Tara Lordi regarding Glenn Straub and Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Tara Lordi
persons.context: Met with Jessica Nicodemo on August 21, 2019, and relayed information about Glenn Straub's interactions with Jeffrey Epstein, including an incident where Epstein brought a minor to a party.

persons.name: Glenn Straub
persons.context: A yacht owner. According to Lordi via Nicodemo, Jeffrey Epstein kept his yacht near Straub's, attended parties on Straub's yacht, and brought a 15-year-old Russian girl to one such party.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central figure in the investigation. The document reports he was on Glenn Straub's yacht multiple times and brought a 15-year-old Russian girl to a party there.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: An FBI Special Agent who conducted the interview of Jessica Nicodemo on August 23, 2019.

connections.description: Epstein kept his yacht near Straub's yacht, attended parties on Straub's yacht, and brought a minor to one such party, indicating a social acquaintance.
Lordi met with Straub on August 21, 2019, and he told her that Jessica Nicodemo had recorded conversations.
Nicodemo met with Lordi on August 21, 2019, where Lordi shared information about Straub and Epstein.

events.title: Lordi-Nicodemo Meeting
events.description: Tara Lordi met with Jessica Nicodemo and relayed information from Glenn Straub about recorded conversations and Jeffrey Epstein's activities.

events.title: FBI Interview of Nicodemo
events.description: Jessica Nicodemo was interviewed telephonically by an FBI Special Agent and an IRS-CID SA regarding her conversation with Tara Lordi about Glenn Straub and Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Epstein Brings Minor to Yacht Party
events.description: According to Tara Lordi via Jessica Nicodemo, Jeffrey Epstein attended a party on Glenn Straub's yacht and brought a 15-year-old Russian girl with him.

keyFacts: Tara Lordi told Jessica Nicodemo that Jeffrey Epstein had been on Glenn Straub's yacht multiple times.
Lordi claimed Epstein brought a 15-year-old Russian girl to a party on Straub's yacht.
Lordi stated that Straub was not necessarily friends with Epstein but that Epstein kept his yacht near Straub's and 'often just showed up.'
The interview was part of an ongoing FBI and IRS-CID investigation in August 2019, shortly after Epstein's death.
The document is a standard FBI 302 form, indicating it is a factual report of an interview and not an analytical document containing conclusions.
